title: 5 Snowdown capsules pack.
body: I already bought the 5 snow down capsules. I would have got the 10 pack but I wasn't sure if the value was worth. Personally, I like the value I got and am looking to buy another 5 pack but the game is stopping me. It doesn't have the option to buy the 5 pack again. Wondering if there is a limit or something{{champion:266}} .

replies.body: The capsules were only available during the snowdown event, which ended last night.
